channel.title: Probability Distributions on Tauseef Rehman
channel.description: Recent content in Probability Distributions on Tauseef Rehman

item.title: Principal Component Analysis on Swiss Bank Notes
item.description: The assumptions of PCA if it is to work well: Linearity Assumes the data set to be linear combinations of the variables.

item.title: Churn Prediction Model
item.description: In this post we will be analysing some Telecom data in python. As the dataset contains a lot of features we will limit the scope of our analysis to creating a churn prediction model and providing some actions on what we can do to decrease this.

item.title: Exploratory Data Analysis
item.description: In this post we will be analysing some Telecom data in python. The aim will be to gain some insight into the features of the data, in particular how they are associated to the churn variable.
